text.language: Agioc o~ Yeoc: a~gioc ic,uroc: a~gioc a~yanatoc: o~ ek paryenou genney/c e~le/~con /~mac.
Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, who was born of the Virgin, have mercy upon us.
Allah Kudus, Mahakuasa Kudus, Kekal Kudus, yang dilahirkan oleh Sang Perawan, kasihanilah kami.
قُدّوسٌ اللَّهُ، قُدّوسٌ القَويُّ، قُدّوسٌ الحَيُّ الَّذي لا يَموتُ، الَّذي وُلِدَ مِنَ العَذْراءِ ارحَمْنا.
